text: Agar ʙar sumo zaxme rasid dar cangi Uhud, hamono rasida musrikonro zaxme monandi on dar cans Badr. In piruz sudanu sikast xurdan hodisahoest, ki megardonem onro mijoni mardumon ʙaroi hikmate, to ma'lum kunad Alloh on cizero medonist dar azal va cudo sozad mu'mini sodiqro az ƣajri on va qavmero az ʙajni sumojon ʙa sahodat nasiʙador gardonad. Va Alloh sitamkoronro dust nadorad, ononro, ki az cang aqiʙnisini kardand
